short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the current thread in OpenAI's playground as a JSON file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to save your current focused thread as JSON while using OpenAI's playground for Assistants. 

By default all HTML formatting is converted into Markdown.

Default shortcut: "ctrl+B" or simply press the icon in the extensions menu from Chrome.
